alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Northwest Carter; Sullivan (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 3:50PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Sullivan, western Johnson, northeastern Carter and south central Washington Counties and the City of Bristol through 530 PM EDT... At 449 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bristol Tn, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bristol Tn, Bristol Va, Bluff City, South Holston Dam, Doeville, Harr, Sadie, Shady Valley, Morril`s Cave and Hunter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
